item.title: High Alchemy, Could rlly use some help plz
item.dc:creator: @sasquiotch sasquiotch
item.description:
@sasquiotch wrote:

replace your code with this one

else if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch fixed by sasquiotch { if(playerLevel[6] >= 55) { if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 10) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 10) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == true)) { alchvalues = (alchvalues / 3); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvalues); addSkillXP((115*playerLevel[6]), 6); startAnimation(712); playerGfx(113, 0); newAnimDelay = 6; newAnim = 712; newAnimRequired = true; deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 10); deleteItem(554,getItemSlot(554), 5); } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 55) { sendMessage("You need at least 55 Magic to cast High Level Alchemy"); } }

item.title: High Alchemy, Could rlly use some help plz
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Ok i have MagicOnItem handler. And every handler i have, when i do like, p.setAnimation, or p.startAnimation, it doesn’t do the animation, it only does it animation when you gain a level… Example, this is my High alch in MagicOnItem

else if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch { alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3); p.deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); p.addItem(995, alchvaluez); p.addSkillXP((65*p.playerLevel[6]), 6); p.setAnimation(713); p.animation(113, p.absY, p.absX); p.deleteItem(561,p.getItemSlot(561), 10); }

2 Problems im having, i would REALLY apreciated help…

  1. Fixing the animations, so that it does the animation, every time i alch.

  2. Making the Gfx body height like runescape. Atm its near my feet/legs (LEL)

Read full topic
